lines.text: Nuts! If I could only get out of drill.
Precisely why I am here. I am Goldie the Goldbrick. Be like me, use your head, with a heart full of gold and a backside full of lead.
Banzai! Here lies their goldbrick, I now go to find more. If I can find enough goldbrick Japan will win war. Goldbrick, honorable goldbrick, honorable goldbrick.
